title: Lost everything i worked for this year because of 1 blindpick troll
body:
Game 1
In-Game
SoHigh3: ?
SoHigh3: cool
SoHigh3: so why did he 2 hit me?
SoHigh3: any logic behind that?
SoHigh3: u have a level on me, u cant 1v1? lmfao
SoHigh3: terrible
SoHigh3: strongest early game champ int he game
SoHigh3: xin baby sits him

(Riven all-chats to report me because shes died)

SoHigh3: toxic riven
SoHigh3: cry more its blind pick
SoHigh3: "how so" u just said to report me cause ur trash tier and died somehow
SoHigh3: LMAO
SoHigh3: your talking to your own teammate in allchat
SoHigh3: lol try to have fun man ur on a game
SoHigh3: play ur main in blind pick somemore
SoHigh3: was talking to yas trash tier not you riven
SoHigh3: jsut report this guy hes so weird
SoHigh3: ggs report riven toxic
SoHigh3: go for it, false reporting gets your future reports ignored
SoHigh3: ur 13 and mad at the world talking trash in unranked league
SoHigh3: congrats
SoHigh3: type*
SoHigh3: nice plus u cant read, muted.

Post-Game
SoHigh3: ggwp
SoHigh3: report toxic riven plz
SoHigh3: her duo bard too
SoHigh3: dont need children taking their frustrations out in league chat



So it took me 2-3 months to get honor level 2 again and an entire year to achieve my current rank...which finally enabled me to receive my ranked rewords (loading screen border ect.) As a result from a single blind pick game (complete chat log provided above) i've lost:
-all my honor level progress
-all ranked rewords for 2018 season
-chat banned for 10 games
-put back on the list of players whose next offense is punishable by account ban. 

1). When someone speaks to you and you respond this is not harassment.
2). The report/ban is not perfect, therefore the system has the potential to be exploited and taken advantage of.
3). There exists, cases where a player is unjustly disciplined by riot

Please restore my honor and ranked rewords and take me off this chat ban.

Meaning there is a difference between behavior that is "toxic" and behavior that crosses that line and results in the ban of that player.
